title: Leeds United Live: Leeds United 1-0 Cardiff City - BBC News
summary: all of the action and reaction as leeds united play cardiff city .
leeds register first home victory since march and first win under steve evans .
mowatt 's second-half strike gives leeds the lead .
three changes for leeds ; byram dropped to bench , mowatt starts .

documents.title: good eveningleeds 1-0 cardiff
text: steve evans has thanked the supporters after his side registered their first home victory in eight months .
you can listen to our exclusive post-match interview with an emotional evans here .
we 'll be back for saturday 's clash with huddersfield town .
thank you as always for joining us , and have a good evening .

documents.title: get involvedleeds 1-0 cardiff
text: jamie buttery
jamiebuttery3
passionate from evans lets hope it continues to rub off on the players @ twitterid
passionate from evans lets hope it continues to rub off on the players @ twitterid

documents.title: more from evansleeds 1-0 cardiff
text: `` it was a good team we beat .
i was really pleased with the manner , the heart and the spirit , '' steve evans told bbc radio leeds .
`` it comes tongue in cheek from a lot of mangers but i 'm really pleased for the supporters tonight .
`` not seeing a win in eight months at home is quite soul destroying .
it takes incredible supporters to keep putting the shirt back on for match days .
i said to play at elland road you have to play with heart and courage .
that 's what i asked from the players and that 's what we got . ''

documents.title: evans on tonight 's winleeds v cardiff
text: steve evans has been speaking to bbc radio leeds about tonight 's win .
`` i was in tears at the final whistle , '' he said .
`` i 'm the motivator of the team and last week i was so low .
`` i thought every one of the 14 players tonight represented this fantastic football club .
they were outstanding . ''

documents.title: scores from the championshipleeds 1-0 cardiff
text: elsewhere in the championship , hull and burnley are both on 31 points at the top of the table .
hull beat brentford 2-0 while burnley claimed a 3-1 victory over fulham .
huddersfield drew 2-2 away at reading and sheffield wednesday held brighton to a goalless draw .

documents.title: the statisticsleeds 1-0 cardiff
text: first home victory since 4th march , first victory over cardiff since 1983 - what a night for leeds united fans .
a stunning goal from alex mowatt was the difference between the two , and marked the first times leeds have gone in front since they played mk dons .
what a fantastic comeback from thursday night 's disappointing effort !

documents.title: full time : leeds 1-0 cardiff
text: leeds have claimed their first home victory in eight months , and put an end to that unwelcome club record .
it took a stunning goal from alex mowatt to secure the win , but it was a leeds side that grew in confidence as the game progressed .
that 's a really impressive fightback from leeds after thursday 's disappointment .
and it 's the first time they 've beaten cardiff since 1983 .
what a night !

documents.title: leeds 1-0 cardiff
text: good work from soulemayne doukara and sam byram sets up chris wood , but there 's another scramble and cardiff break again .

text: nervy for leeds as anthony pilkington 's shot curls over the bar .

text: so close again fro leeds as chris wood goes one-on-one with david marshall .

wood covers his head with his shirt straight away - he chased that ball down and created the error from cardiff .
it breaks for cardiff almost straight away - can leeds hold on to their lead ?

documents.title: leeds 1-0 cardiff
text: sam byram is in the action straight away as he works the ball into the box and chips it towards goal .
it 's gathered by david marshall but it 's that sort of intent that leeds need to be showing .

documents.title: leeds 1-0 cardiff
text: the first substitute of the half for leeds as stuart dallas is replaced by sam byram .
dallas receives extended applause from the crowd - he really has been fantastic for leeds today , full of energy .

documents.title: leeds 1-0 cardiff
text: cardiff have stepped up after that goal - they 're certainly seeing more of the goal .
it 's been a good game for marco silvestri though , who looks a lot more confident coming forward .
he 's off his line again to smother cardiff 's latest challenge .

documents.title: breakinggoal mowatt : leeds 1-0 cardiff
text: an absolute beauty of a goal from alex mowatt has given leeds the lead .
it had been building up for leeds , with some lovely work between lewis cook and mirco antenucci .
then mowatt , from 30 yards out , has slammed the ball as sweetly as you could wish over the head of david marshall and into the back of the net .
leeds lead for the first time since mk dons !

documents.title: `` massimo invited us to buy his majority stake '' leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: you can listen here to our exclusive interview with leeds united fans , on buying out massimo cellino 's stake in the club .
cellino has said in principle that he would sell his stake in the club to the trust - and they are meeting his lawyers tomorrow to discuss money .

documents.title: hello liam bridcutt ? leeds v cardiff
text: steve evans has confirmed that leeds are closing in on signing sunderland 's liam bridcutt .
speaking to bbc leeds , evans said he is wanting to add some more quality to his leeds side .
`` it 's the purr of leeds united - the kid wants to play in front of 30,000 fans , '' he said .
`` we know that things are going to get better on and off the pitch . ''

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiffmore from noel
text: it 's all leeds united .
steve evans is applauding the quality and the tempo they 've had in this half .
th last 20 minutes have flown by , because fo the pressure they 've been putting on cardiff .
it 's a shame they 've not capitalised on it and made the most of it .
can they get a lead ?
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: a game of two halves for leeds ; cautious in the first and more awake in the second .
chris wood , lewis cook and alex mowatt have all had a few chances but they 've worked better as a unit .
it 's 0-0 but leeds are probably on top - can they force a win ?

it 's well judged , flying towards the goal , but it 's deflected out at the last minute .

some better play from leeds as scott wootton and stuart dallas link up , but dallas fires wide .

lewis cook wins the ball and weaves his way free , but the ball into the box is wasted and another good run from leeds is ended by a poor finish .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiffmore from noel
text: cardiff do n't take any chances .
they boot the ball out .
there 's no real flow to their game .
they are quite aggressive but leeds have had the better of them so far .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: liam cooper gets caught in possession and takes out his man - he gets a finger wagging but there 's no card from the referee .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: cardiff have their first real chance as alex revell 's half-volley from far out sails high over the bar .
leeds have looked fairly comfortable so far but they will have to start pushing if they want to register a home victory .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: luke murphy crosses the ball into the area , a lovely weighted pass right into alex mowatt 's chest , and leeds win a corner .
murphy takes the corner but it 's far too long and it sails easily out of play .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: cardiff break , but liam cooper 's slightly mistimed tackle keeps them at bay .
leeds have probably had the better of the opening ten minutes but neither keeper has been troubled .
both sides are taking it slowly .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiffnoel on the opening
text: we 're looking for quality .
steve evans has spoken about it , how important it is to put it into gear in the final third .
it is so important to get onto teams and then keep them there .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: big shout for a penalty as mirco antenucci looks to have been pulled down in the area .
the referee waves play on

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: a quiet start , although alex mowatt has the first real chance for leeds .
he has a chance to shoot from the edge of the box but , maybe lacking in confidence , he passe through to gaetano berardi and his cross is cleared .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: we 're two minutes in and it 's still 0-0 , which allows leeds fans to breathe a sigh of relief .
leeds have lined up with alex mowatt on the left , with lewis cook and luke murphy in midfield .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 cardiff
text: great respect shown at elland road from all to our fallen heroes on leeds united 's military day .
author: Gareth Jones
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

text: leeds have come charging out to the sound of d : ream 's things can only get better .
the same song was played against blackburn , where leeds went 2-0 down inside six minutes .
things really can only get better from there

documents.title: home strugglesleeds v cardiff
text: three - that 's the grand total of points that leeds have up at elland road this season .
they have n't won at home since 4th march against ipswich , and their last three home games have all been defeats .
united have kept just one clean sheet in the league this season .
steve evans has spoken about wanting teams to fear coming to elland road - can he make it fortress elland road once more ?

documents.title: eye on the oppositionleeds v cardiff
text: back to on the pitch matters and it makes for grim reading for leeds fans .
cardiff have an excellent record against leeds , having won five of their last eight trips to elland road .
the last time the two sides met in april , it was arun gunnarsson 's 62nd minute strike that sealed a 2-1 victory for the bluebirds .
united 's struggles at home have been well documented , and russell slade will be hoping to exploit that tonight .

documents.title: cellino watching from the sidelinesleeds v cardiff
text: chairman cellino also released a statement this week confirming he would not attend any more games this season .
cellino received a hard time from the crowd during the bolton game and it appears to have had an effect .
the fans made it clear they believe i am no longer the best person for this job , and for the first time i am starting to think that they may be correct , '' he said .

documents.title: listen to the leeds fans united interviewleeds v cardiff
text: you can listen to our exclusive interview with the leeds fans united , and other audio from this week , here .
let us know your thoughts on the cellino situation by tweeting us @ twitterid

documents.title: `` i would sell to the fans '' leeds v cardiff
text: it 's been a busy week for massimo cellino and the leeds fans united trust .
cellino confirmed on friday that he would , in principle , sell his shares in the club to the fans trust .
the trust have seen an upsurge in members and they are confident of raising the money needed .
`` massimo invited us to buy his majority stake and has agreed to sell to us at cost , at the money he has put into the club , '' chief executive dylan thwaites told bbc radio leeds .

documents.title: popey on tonight 's gameleeds v cardiff
text: leeds go in search of the elusive home win against cardiff city , who they 've not beaten since 1983 .
the good news is that steve evans has beaten cardiff already this season with former club rotherham .
leeds have scored first in just one of seven home games this season - the opening day draw with burnley .
cardiff may not score many goals but a great keeper in david marshall , plus a strong back four , is largely responsible for them sitting ninth in the table .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: breakingteam newsleeds v cardiff
text: leeds are without captain sol bamba , who is banned for one match after up five cautions this season .
that means three changes for leeds , with sam byram dropped to the bench .
liam cooper will deputise for bamba .
leeds united xi : silvestri , wootton , cooper , bellusci , berardi , dallas , murphy , cook , mowatt , antenucci , wood
cardiff city xi : marshall , peltier , morrison , connolly , malone , ralls , gunnarsson , whittingham , noone , revell , mason .

documents.title: fortress elland road ? leeds v cardiff
text: good evening , and welcome to tonight 's live coverage of leeds united v cardiff city .
steve evans is still searching for his first win as manager - and despite an encouraging opening game , thursday 's loss to bolton was a big blow .
leeds face a tough test against cardiff city , who are unbeaten in their last six games .
join us here as you listen to our live coverage on 92.4 fm and freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can claim that elusive home victory .
